PATIENT_ID: TEST_TRAUMATIC_ARREST_002
ARRIVAL_TIME: 2026-02-06 09:00:00

[TRAUMA_HP] 2026-02-06 09:10:00
Category II activation for 48-year-old male. Fall from 8 feet.
Alert and oriented on arrival. GCS 15. Ambulatory at scene.
BP 130/82, HR 76, RR 14.
Left heel pain and swelling. No other complaints.

[IMAGING] 2026-02-06 09:30:00
Left calcaneus x-ray: comminuted calcaneal fracture.
Thoracolumbar spine imaging normal. No other injuries.

[PHYSICIAN_NOTE] 2026-02-06 09:50:00
Isolated left calcaneal fracture. Splinted. Admitted for orthopedic management.
Hemodynamically stable throughout stay.
